## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1f585e18c5231e86019bb574a705a7436461cbc4ffe0e39ad716bd32bc02b618)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'megai' @ 92.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
